p: It is believed that the only sustainable way to survive in the current situation is to boost the immune system. Many foods and herbs have antiviral and immunomodulatory properties. A balanced diet and dietary intake of nutrients affect the immune system through gene expression, cell activation and modification of signaling molecules. In addition, various food ingredients are determinants of the gut microbial composition and subsequently form immune responses in the body [ 138, 139, 140]. A diet combined with medicinal plants with immunomodulatory, antiviral and anti-inflammatory effects can significantly enhance this protection.
